calculationForNumberOfArmiesInReinforcement(HashMap<Player, ArrayList<Country>>, ArrayList<Continent>) - Method in class model.Player
This method calculates the corresponding reinforcement armies from a particular player from the number of countries owned by the layer.
callWinner(String) - Method in class views.FinishView

The Enum Card.
CardView - Class in views
This class is used to chose the cards by the player during the Reinforcement phase of the game to obtain new armies.
CardView(Game) - Constructor for class views.CardView
Instantiates a new card view.
Cheater - Class in strategies
This class is used for cheater computer player strategy whose reinforce() method doubles the number of armies on all its countries, whose attack() method automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries, and whose fortify() method doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
Cheater() - Constructor for class strategies.Cheater
